blockedSessions.workDescription: Next.js web dashboard deployment investigation - discovered Turborepo monorepo incompatibility with Azure App Service source deployment

blockers.description: Turborepo monorepo + Next.js standalone mode incompatible with Azure App Service. Symlink creation fails on Windows (EPERM), Azure Oryx doesn't handle monorepo structure.
blockers.impact: Production deployment completely blocked - web dashboard cannot be deployed to Azure
blockers.rootCause: Fundamental incompatibility between Next.js standalone mode symlink requirements and Azure App Service build system
